item.title: Lotto Powerball jackpots to $26m after no one claims massive pool
item.description:
Who won Powerball's $23 million jackpot in tonight's Lotto Draw?
Nobody. The prize pool will be $26 million on Wednesday.
But 10 people share Lotto First Division - each of their tickets now worth $100,000 ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: Young dad told he has an STI, turns out it's cancer
item.description:
A young Whangārei dad was horrified to discover he had a deadly avocado-sized tumour, six weeks after being told it was probably a sexually transmitted infection (STI).
Hayden Baker remembers being ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202030/young-dad_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Hayden Baker has been left angered after a misdiagnosis of his testicular cancer led to the cancer spreading. Photo / Alan Gibson

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202030/SCCZEN_160720NZHAGBAKER09_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Hayden Baker, pictured with his wife Leah Baker, has been left angered after a misdiagnosis of his testicular cancer led to the cancer spreading.
